downloadTitle: Office Cheat Sheet: Outlook Mail for Windows download
downloadDescription: This download provides a .PDF and .PPTX version of the Outlook Mail for Windows Cheat Sheet.
detailsSection: The Outlook Mail for Windows Cheat Sheet provides a quick visual reference for using Outlook 2016, including organizing your inbox, finding and using key features, navigating menus, using keyboard shortcuts, and getting links Outlook Help and Training. This download contains .PDF and .PPTX versions.
installInstructionSection: Save the file to a directory on your computer and extract the .zip file.
